Posts.Content: Jun 16, 2009 06:16AM gts wrote: Mine are doing the exact same thing.  It's been about 2 months since my last treatment.  They were perfectly fine and strong and now all of a sudden they are lifting off the beds.  I too have cut them really short but i'm starting to worry because of debris getting in between the nail and my fingers. Will they grow back normal?
